trans-unit.source: Represents a header or footer that is associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> provides header and footer information for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner> when it is displayed in print preview mode.
If provided by the workflow designer, users can configure headers and footers on the **Header/Footer** tab on the **Page Setup** dialog box.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> class.
The SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner with which the

`true` to indicate that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> is a header; `false` to indicate that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> is a footer.
Gets the root designer to which the header or footer is applied.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> is applied.
Gets the bounding rectangle of the header or footer on the workflow design surface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
Gets or sets the image associated with the header or footer.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to associate with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>.
Gets the bounding rectangle for the image associated with the header or footer.

The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Image"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> when the elements it contains are repositioned by the user.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Draws the header or footer associated with the workflow root designer on the design surface.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
e contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets or sets the text description associated with the header or footer.
The string that contains the text description associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>.
Gets the bounding rectangle for the text associated with the header or footer.

The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>.
